Columns.Name: SKU Identifier
Columns.Description: Unique identifier of every stock keeping unit

Columns.Name: Third Party SKU Identifier
Columns.Description: The third party Identifier provided for the SKU

Columns.Name: Market Area Identifier
Columns.Description: Market Data provided by some cluster/ region

Columns.Name: Date
Columns.Description: Date on which metrics is referred

Columns.Name: Market Area description
Columns.Description: Description of the market area or region

Columns.Name: Online Market Share
Columns.Description: Market share of the SKU in the online channel

Columns.Name: Store Market Share
Columns.Description: Market share of the SKU in the regular (store) channel

Columns.Name: Total Online Market Sales
Columns.Description: Total market Sales in online channel for the SKU in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Stores Market Sales
Columns.Description: Total market Sales via stores for the SKU in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Online Market Sales  Units
Columns.Description: Total market Sales units in online channel for the SKU in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Stores Market Sales Units
Columns.Description: Total market Sales Units via stores for the SKU in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Retailer Online Sales
Columns.Description: Total market sales of Retailer for the SKU in online channel in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Retailer Store Sales
Columns.Description: Total market Sales of Retailer for the SKU in physical stores in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Retailer Online Market Sales  Units
Columns.Description: Total market Sales units of retailer for the SKU in the region/ online

Columns.Name: Total Retailer Store Market Sales Units
Columns.Description: Total market Sales units of retailer for the SKU in the region/ online

Properties.PrimaryKeys: Sales Organisation,SKU Identifier,Third Party SKU Identifier,Market Area Identifier
